20110131050111.000|20110131050115.000|CC1|DISAPPOINTING, BUT DEFENDED ITS 
20110131050115.000|20110131050122.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT'S PLAN.

20110131050126.000|20110131050127.000|CC1|OUR DEEPEST CONDOLENCES TO ALL

20110131050515.000|20110131050516.000|CC1|IT WILL BE CHOPPY AND IT WILL

20110131050554.000|20110131050555.000|CC1|QUARTER OF 2010, NO GROWTH AT

20110131050603.000|20110131050604.000|CC1|THIS.

20110131050618.000|20110131050621.000|CC1|CONFEDERATION OF BRITISH        
20110131050621.000|20110131050622.000|CC1|INDUSTRY AND THE GOVERNOR OF    
20110131050622.000|20110131050624.000|CC1|THE BANK OF ENGLAND ALL SAID    
20110131050624.000|20110131050626.000|CC1|THAT THERE WAS NO CREDIBLE PLAN 
20110131050626.000|20110131050630.000|CC1|TO DEAL WITH THE DEFICIT.       
20110131050630.000|20110131050632.000|CC1|IF YOU DO NOT DEAL WITH YOUR    
20110131050632.000|20110131050633.000|CC1|DEBTS, YOU WILL NEVER HAVE      
20110131050633.000|20110131050634.000|CC1|GROWTH.                         
20110131050634.000|20110131050635.000|CC1|THAT IS THE TRUTH, AND THE RIGHT
20110131050635.000|20110131050636.000|CC1|HONORABLE GENTLEMAN KNOWS IT.   
20110131050636.000|20110131050637.000|CC1|>> THE PRIME MINISTER DOES NOT  
20110131050637.000|20110131050637.000|CC1|GET IT.                         
20110131050637.000|20110131050639.000|CC1|IF YOU DO NOT HAVE GROWTH, YOU  
20110131050639.000|20110131050640.000|CC1|WILL NEVER CUT THE DEFICIT.     
20110131050640.000|20110131050641.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT WE SAW IN THE LAST 
20110131050641.000|20110131050642.000|CC1|QUARTER OF 2010.                
20110131050642.000|20110131050644.000|CC1|AS MILLIONS OF FAMILIES AND

20110131050649.000|20110131050650.000|CC1|RISING AND GROWTH STALLED, WHAT

20110131050703.000|20110131050704.000|CC1|COUNTRY IS GET THE DEFICIT DOWN,

20110131050722.000|20110131050723.000|CC1|EXCEPTIONAL IN TERMS OF ITS

20110131050729.000|20110131050730.000|CC1|WITH THE DEFICIT IS THE BEST

20110131050735.000|20110131050737.000|CC1|THE DEFICIT YOU CAN BE ASSURED  
20110131050737.000|20110131050739.000|CC1|THAT THERE WILL NOT BE GROWTH   
20110131050739.000|20110131050740.000|CC1|BECAUSE CONFIDENCE WILL NOT     
20110131050740.000|20110131050740.000|CC1|RECOVER."                       
20110131050740.000|20110131050742.000|CC1|THIS MAN, WHO IS ENTIRELY       
20110131050742.000|20110131050743.000|CC1|INDEPENDENT AND IN CHARGE OF    
20110131050743.000|20110131050744.000|CC1|THE OECD, IS GIVING US GOOD     
20110131050744.000|20110131050745.000|CC1|ADVICE, AND I ADVISE THE RIGHT  
20110131050745.000|20110131050746.000|CC1|HONORABLE GENTLEMAN, AS HE HAS A
20110131050746.000|20110131050747.000|CC1|NEW SHADOW CHANCELLOR AND CAN   
20110131050747.000|20110131050753.000|CC1|MAKE A NEW START, TO FOLLOW IT. 
20110131050753.000|20110131050756.000|CC1|>> THE DIFFERENCE IS THAT WHEN  
20110131050756.000|20110131050758.000|CC1|WE LEFT OFFICE THE ECONOMY WAS  
20110131050758.000|20110131050759.000|CC1|GROWING.                        
20110131050759.000|20110131050801.000|CC1|NOW THE PRIME MINISTER IS IN    
20110131050801.000|20110131050803.000|CC1|OFFICE, AND IT IS NOT. I HAVE A 
20110131050803.000|20110131050805.000|CC1|VERY SPECIFIC QUESTION TO ASK   
20110131050805.000|20110131050806.000|CC1|THE PRIME MINISTER.             
20110131050806.000|20110131050811.000|CC1|HE HAS ALREADY MADE CLEAR HIS   
20110131050811.000|20110131050812.000|CC1|DECISION ON VAT, BUT HE STILL   
20110131050812.000|20110131050814.000|CC1|HAS A CHOICE TO MAKE ABOUT      
20110131050814.000|20110131050816.000|CC1|WHETHER TO GO AHEAD WITH THE    
20110131050816.000|20110131050819.000|CC1|DECISION TO TAKE ANOTHER 20     
20110131050819.000|20110131050821.000|CC1|BILLION POUNDS OUT OF THE       
20110131050821.000|20110131050823.000|CC1|ECONOMY THIS YEAR WHEN THE      
20110131050823.000|20110131050824.000|CC1|RECOVERY IS FRAGILE.            
20110131050824.000|20110131050826.000|CC1|IS HE TELLING THE HOUSE AND THE 
20110131050826.000|20110131050827.000|CC1|COUNTRY THAT HE IS DETERMINED   
20110131050827.000|20110131050828.000|CC1|TO GO AHEAD, IRRESPECTIVE OF    
20110131050828.000|20110131050829.000|CC1|THE FIGURES AND IRRESPECTIVE OF 
20110131050829.000|20110131050831.000|CC1|WHAT PEOPLE UP AND DOWN THE     
20110131050831.000|20110131050835.000|CC1|COUNTRY ARE FEELING?            
20110131050835.000|20110131050837.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE NOW HEARD WHAT I     
20110131050837.000|20110131050838.000|CC1|THINK WE ARE GOING TO HEAR A    
20110131050838.000|20110131050839.000|CC1|LOT MORE OF, THE THEORY THAT    
20110131050839.000|20110131050841.000|CC1|THERE WAS A GOLDEN INHERITANCE  
20110131050841.000|20110131050843.000|CC1|FROM THE LABOUR PARTY.          
20110131050843.000|20110131050845.000|CC1|THAT IS ONE OF THE MOST         
20110131050845.000|20110131050846.000|CC1|LAUGHABLE PROPOSITIONS THAT I   
20110131050846.000|20110131050847.000|CC1|HAVE EVER HEARD PUT IN THE      
20110131050847.000|20110131050848.000|CC1|HOUSE OF COMMONS. WE WILL NOT   
20110131050848.000|20110131050850.000|CC1|FORGET THAT WE HAD THE BIGGEST  
20110131050850.000|20110131050852.000|CC1|BUDGET DEFICIT IN THE WHOLE OF  
20110131050852.000|20110131050853.000|CC1|EUROPE, AND THAT WE WERE        
20110131050853.000|20110131050854.000|CC1|SPENDING 120 MILLION POUNDS     
20110131050854.000|20110131050856.000|CC1|EVERY DAY JUST ON THE INTEREST  
20110131050856.000|20110131050857.000|CC1|ON THAT DEFICIT.                
20110131050857.000|20110131050859.000|CC1|WE INHERITED A SITUATION IN     
20110131050859.000|20110131050900.000|CC1|WHICH, BECAUSE OF THE           
20110131050900.000|20110131050901.000|CC1|REGULATION CARRIED OUT BY THE   
20110131050901.000|20110131050902.000|CC1|RIGHT HONORABLE GENTLEMAN AND   
20110131050902.000|20110131050904.000|CC1|THE SHADOW CHANCELLOR WHEN THEY 
20110131050904.000|20110131050907.000|CC1|WERE IN THE TREASURY, WE HAD    
20110131050907.000|20110131050909.000|CC1|THE BIGGEST BOOM AND THE        
20110131050909.000|20110131050911.000|CC1|BIGGEST BUST IN OUR BANKING     
20110131050911.000|20110131050912.000|CC1|SYSTEM.                         
20110131050912.000|20110131050914.000|CC1|WE HAD A GROWTH MODEL THAT WAS  
20110131050914.000|20110131050915.000|CC1|BASED ON UNCONTROLLABLE BOOM IN 
20110131050915.000|20110131050916.000|CC1|HOUSING, UNCONTROLLABLE BOOM IN 
20110131050916.000|20110131050917.000|CC1|FINANCIAL SERVICES,             
20110131050917.000|20110131050919.000|CC1|UNCONTROLLED PUBLIC SPENDING,   
20110131050919.000|20110131050921.000|CC1|AND UNCONTROLLED IMMIGRATION.   
20110131050921.000|20110131050924.000|CC1|WE INHERITED A COMPLETELY BUST  
20110131050924.000|20110131050925.000|CC1|SYSTEM FROM THE TWO PEOPLE WHO  
20110131050925.000|20110131050926.000|CC1|WORKED IN THE TREASURY          
20110131050926.000|20110131050927.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE LAST LABOUR      
20110131050927.000|20110131050928.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT.                     
20110131050928.000|20110131050929.000|CC1|>> I SUPPOSE WE CAN TAKE IT

20110131050931.000|20110131050932.000|CC1|MINISTER IS NOT GOING TO CHANGE 
20110131050932.000|20110131050934.000|CC1|COURSE.

20110131050935.000|20110131050938.000|CC1|TO BRING ABOUT GROWTH IN THE    
20110131050938.000|20110131050939.000|CC1|ECONOMY.                        
20110131050939.000|20110131050940.000|CC1|THIS IS HOW OUT OF TOUCH HE IS. 
20110131050940.000|20110131050942.000|CC1|WHAT PEOPLE UP AND DOWN THE     
20110131050942.000|20110131050943.000|CC1|COUNTRY ARE SAYING IS THAT HE

20110131050946.000|20110131050946.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT IS INHIBITING      
20110131050946.000|20110131050949.000|CC1|GROWTH IN THIS COUNTRY.

20110131050951.000|20110131050954.000|CC1|CUTS ARE BEING MADE IN THE      
20110131050954.000|20110131050955.000|CC1|PUBLIC SECTOR AND WHILE JOBS

20110131051003.000|20110131051004.000|CC1|WHY DOES NOT THE PRIME

20110131051523.000|20110131051525.000|CC1|>> MY HONORABLE FRIEND MAKES A

20110131051529.000|20110131051532.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT THE LABOUR

20110131051533.000|20110131051535.000|CC1|WHEREAS IN NATIONAL POLITICS

20110131051537.000|20110131051537.000|CC1|POLITICIANS.                    
20110131051537.000|20110131051539.000|CC1|IT IS NICE WORK IF YOU CAN GET  
20110131051539.000|20110131051541.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110131051541.000|20110131051543.000|CC1|>> THE GOVERNMENT HAVE SWITCHED 
20110131051543.000|20110131051544.000|CC1|THE INDEXATION OF BENEFITS AND  
20110131051544.000|20110131051546.000|CC1|PUBLIC SECTOR PENSIONS FROM THE 
20110131051546.000|20110131051548.000|CC1|RETAIL PRICES INDEX TO THE      
20110131051548.000|20110131051550.000|CC1|LOWER CONSUMER PRICES INDEX, BUT
20110131051550.000|20110131051552.000|CC1|WHEN IT COMES TO HIKING UP      
20110131051552.000|20110131051553.000|CC1|PETROL, THEY CONTINUE TO USE THE
20110131051553.000|20110131051554.000|CC1|HIGHER RETAIL PRICES INDEX.     
20110131051554.000|20110131051559.000|CC1|IN THE INTERESTS OF FAIRNESS,   
20110131051559.000|20110131051601.000|CC1|HOW CAN THE PRIME MINISTER      
20110131051601.000|20110131051603.000|CC1|JUSTIFY USING THE HIGHER        
20110131051603.000|20110131051606.000|CC1|INDEXATION FOR PETROL?          
20110131051606.000|20110131051608.000|CC1|SHOULD THE GOVERNMENT NOT AT    
20110131051608.000|20110131051608.000|CC1|THE VERY LEAST USE ONE OR THE   
20110131051608.000|20110131051614.000|CC1|OTHER?                          
20110131051614.000|20110131051616.000|CC1|>> I CAN GIVE THE HONORABLE     
20110131051616.000|20110131051616.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN ONE TIP.              
20110131051616.000|20110131051617.000|CC1|BEFORE WRITING THE QUESTION, IT 
20110131051617.000|20110131051619.000|CC1|IS ALWAYS GOOD TO WORK OUT ONE'S
20110131051619.000|20110131051619.000|CC1|OWN PARTY'S POLICY.             
20110131051619.000|20110131051621.000|CC1|THE OPPOSITION ARE NOW          
20110131051621.000|20110131051622.000|CC1|COMMITTED TO INCREASING BENEFITS
20110131051622.000|20110131051626.000|CC1|BY CPI RATHER THAN RPI.         
20110131051626.000|20110131051627.000|CC1|HIS PARTY IS BACKING OUR POLICY 
20110131051627.000|20110131051629.000|CC1|AND IS FAR FROM OPPOSING IT.    
20110131051629.000|20110131051631.000|CC1|>> RECENT WORK BY THE NUFFIELD  
20110131051631.000|20110131051633.000|CC1|FOUNDATION HAS SHOWN THAT       
20110131051633.000|20110131051635.000|CC1|BRITAIN HAS THE LOWEST          
20110131051635.000|20110131051636.000|CC1|PROPORTION OF 16 TO 18-YEAR-    
20110131051636.000|20110131051638.000|CC1|OLDS STUDYING MATHEMATICS OF ANY
20110131051638.000|20110131051640.000|CC1|OF OUR COMPETITOR COUNTRIES IN  
20110131051640.000|20110131051645.000|CC1|THE OECD.                       
20110131051645.000|20110131051648.000|CC1|JUST AS BAD, WE HAVE A CHRONIC  
20110131051648.000|20110131051649.000|CC1|SHORTAGE OF MATHS TEACHERS IN   
20110131051649.000|20110131051651.000|CC1|OUR SCHOOLS.                    
20110131051651.000|20110131051653.000|CC1|WHAT ACTION ARE THE GOVERNMENT  
20110131051653.000|20110131051654.000|CC1|GOING TO TAKE ON THIS ISSUE?    
20110131051654.000|20110131051656.000|CC1|>> MY HONORABLE FRIEND MAKES A  
20110131051656.000|20110131051659.000|CC1|VERY GOOD POINT.                
20110131051659.000|20110131051701.000|CC1|THE NUFFIELD FOUNDATION HAS     
20110131051701.000|20110131051702.000|CC1|PRODUCED AN EXTREMELY           
20110131051702.000|20110131051704.000|CC1|WORTHWHILE REPORT ON HOW BADLY  
20110131051704.000|20110131051705.000|CC1|WE ARE DOING WITH MATHS TEACHING
20110131051705.000|20110131051705.000|CC1|AND IN TERMS OF THE NUMBER OF   
20110131051705.000|20110131051708.000|CC1|PEOPLE STUDYING MATHS.          
20110131051708.000|20110131051711.000|CC1|WE WILL BE TAKING A SERIES OF   
20110131051711.000|20110131051713.000|CC1|STEPS TO SORT THIS OUT, WHICH   
20110131051713.000|20110131051715.000|CC1|WILL BE ANNOUNCED BY MY RIGHT

20110131051717.000|20110131051718.000|CC1|SECRETARY.                      
20110131051718.000|20110131051720.000|CC1|ONE IS TO EXPAND TEACH FIRST,   
20110131051720.000|20110131051721.000|CC1|WHICH IS AN EXCELLENT SCHEME TO 
20110131051721.000|20110131051722.000|CC1|GET GRADUATES FROM OUR BEST

20110131051723.000|20110131051724.000|CC1|WHICH, FOR THE FIRST TIME, WILL 
20110131051724.000|20110131051726.000|CC1|INCLUDE PRIMARY SCHOOLS.        
20110131051726.000|20110131051728.000|CC1|MANY OF THEM WILL BE MATHS      
20110131051728.000|20110131051730.000|CC1|TEACHERS.                       
20110131051730.000|20110131051732.000|CC1|WE ALSO WANT TO RAISE THE BAR   
20110131051732.000|20110131051735.000|CC1|FOR TEACHERS AS REGARDS THE     
20110131051735.000|20110131051738.000|CC1|QUALIFICATIONS THEY NEED TO     
20110131051738.000|20110131051740.000|CC1|TEACH MATHS.                    
20110131051740.000|20110131051742.000|CC1|THAT IS VITAL IN OUR COUNTRY    
20110131051742.000|20110131051742.000|CC1|AND MY HONORABLE FRIEND IS RIGHT
20110131051742.000|20110131051743.000|CC1|TO HIGHLIGHT THE ISSUE.         
20110131051743.000|20110131051745.000|CC1|>> LAST FRIDAY, I VISITED MY    
20110131051745.000|20110131051746.000|CC1|CONSTITUENT VERA GASKIN AT HER  
20110131051746.000|20110131051753.000|CC1|LIVINGSTON HOME.                
20110131051753.000|20110131051754.000|CC1|MRS GASKIN HAS HEPATITIS C,     
20110131051754.000|20110131051756.000|CC1|HAVING CONTRACTED IT IN 1985    
20110131051756.000|20110131051758.000|CC1|THROUGH A TRANSFUSION OF        
20110131051758.000|20110131051800.000|CC1|CONTAMINATED BLOOD.             
20110131051800.000|20110131051802.000|CC1|SHE HAD BEEN DIAGNOSED WITH     
20110131051802.000|20110131051804.000|CC1|HODGKIN'S DISEASE AT THE TIME.  
20110131051804.000|20110131051805.000|CC1|OF COURSE, HER SITUATION IS NOT 
20110131051805.000|20110131051807.000|CC1|DISSIMILAR TO THAT OF THE       
20110131051807.000|20110131051809.000|CC1|SEVERAL THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE WHO 
20110131051809.000|20110131051810.000|CC1|ALSO SUFFERED DUE TO THE

20110131051812.000|20110131051814.000|CC1|1970S AND 1980S.                
20110131051814.000|20110131051816.000|CC1|SADLY, MANY HAVE PASSED AWAY

20110131051846.000|20110131051848.000|CC1|HIM ABOUT THIS EXTREMELY

20110131051914.000|20110131051915.000|CC1|I AM NOT SURE THAT THERE IS     
20110131051915.000|20110131051916.000|CC1|EVER A LEVEL OF PAYMENT THAT

20110131052208.000|20110131052211.000|CC1|MORE THAN 3 MILLION POUNDS?     
20110131052211.000|20110131052212.000|CC1|>> MY HONORABLE FRIEND MAKES A

20110131052235.000|20110131052236.000|CC1|DID NOT DO IN 13 YEARS OF BEING

20110131052246.000|20110131052248.000|CC1|I THINK THE WHOLE HOUSE SHOULD  
20110131052248.000|20110131052251.000|CC1|CELEBRATE THAT.                 
20110131052251.000|20110131052255.000|CC1|>> THE FORMER INVESTIGATING     
20110131052255.000|20110131052256.000|CC1|OFFICER IS NOW ON THE PAYROLL OF
20110131052256.000|20110131052257.000|CC1|NEWS INTERNATIONAL AND THREE    
20110131052257.000|20110131052258.000|CC1|SENIOR EDITORS HAVE BEEN        
20110131052258.000|20110131052300.000|CC1|IDENTIFIED IN RELATION TO PHONE 
20110131052300.000|20110131052302.000|CC1|HACKING.                        
20110131052302.000|20110131052304.000|CC1|IS IT NOT TIME THAT ANOTHER     
20110131052304.000|20110131052305.000|CC1|POLICE FORCE TOOK OVER THE      
20110131052305.000|20110131052308.000|CC1|INQUIRY?                        
20110131052308.000|20110131052310.000|CC1|YOU HAVE THE STATUS TO MAKE IT  
20110131052310.000|20110131052311.000|CC1|HAPPEN, PRIME MINISTER.         
20110131052311.000|20110131052312.000|CC1|WHAT ARE YOU AFRAID OF?         
20110131052312.000|20110131052313.000|CC1|>> LET ME BE ABSOLUTELY CLEAR,

20110131052905.000|20110131052908.000|CC1|>> LAST WEEK THE PUBLIC         
20110131052908.000|20110131052909.000|CC1|ACCOUNTS COMMITTEE FOUND THAT   
20110131052909.000|20110131052910.000|CC1|THE PREVIOUS LABOUR GOVERNMENT  
20110131052910.000|20110131052911.000|CC1|HAD PUSHED THROUGH PRIVATE      
20110131052911.000|20110131052912.000|CC1|FINANCE INITIATIVE DEALS WITHOUT

20110131052913.000|20110131052914.000|CC1|OFTEN REGARDLESS OF EXPENSE OR  
20110131052914.000|20110131052915.000|CC1|VALUE FOR MONEY.

20110131052916.000|20110131052917.000|CC1|TAXPAYER BILLIONS OF POUNDS TOO 
20110131052917.000|20110131052918.000|CC1|MUCH.                           
20110131052918.000|20110131052919.000|CC1|DOES THE PRIME MINISTER SHARE   
20110131052919.000|20110131052920.000|CC1|MY VIEW THAT THERE SHOULD NOW BE
20110131052920.000|20110131052922.000|CC1|A FULL INVESTIGATION OF WHY AND 
20110131052922.000|20110131052923.000|CC1|HOW THAT HAPPENED?              
20110131052923.000|20110131052925.000|CC1|>> I THANK MY HONORABLE FRIEND  
20110131052925.000|20110131052927.000|CC1|FOR HIS QUESTION.               
20110131052927.000|20110131052929.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC ACCOUNTS COMMITTEE   
20110131052929.000|20110131052930.000|CC1|CAN DO A LOT OF THAT WORK BY    
20110131052930.000|20110131052932.000|CC1|UNVEILING SOME OF THE APPALLING 
20110131052932.000|20110131052933.000|CC1|DECISIONS THAT WERE MADE, WHICH 
20110131052933.000|20110131052935.000|CC1|WERE JUST ABOUT OFF-BALANCE-    
20110131052935.000|20110131052936.000|CC1|SHEET ACCOUNTING, RATHER THAN   
20110131052936.000|20110131052944.000|CC1|GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY.
